WhatsApp submitted a new update through the TestFlight Beta Program that shows the company is testing voice message playback speed.
According to WABetaInfo, WhatsApp version 2.21.60.11 is not ready … [+1054 chars]

articles.title: Ludwig becomes most-subbed Twitch streamer with insane 150-hour subathon - Dexerto
articles.description: Former Smash Bros caster Ludwig has become the most-subscribed Twitch streamer after reaching 150 hours in his subathon.
articles.content:
Twitch streamer Ludwig Ahgren has become the most subscribed Twitch streamer on the platform, according to stats, thanks to an insane “Subathon” stream, that has been going for over 6 days.
